text: Bog nisposlal samoye luchsheye ucheniye - pisaniye s inoskazatel'nymi, s povtoryayushchimisya chteniyami: ot nego szhimayetsya kozha na tele tekh, kotoryye boyatsya Gospoda svoyego; a potom ot vospominaniya o Boge kozha ikh i serdtsa ikh smyagchayutsya. Takovo voditel'stvo Bozhiye; im On stavit na pryamoy put' kogo khochet; no kogo Bog vvedet v zabluzhdeniye, dlya togo net vozhdya
